Rule: Occupation Rule: Transition from 'Blue-Collar' to 'White-Collar' or 'Sales'
Marital Status Rule: Being 'Separated' might be associated with higher income compared to being 'Married'
Age Rule: Older individuals (ages 69, 71, 90) show higher income potential than middle-aged individuals (age 53)
Race Rule: Both 'White' and 'Other' races can achieve higher income, suggesting that occupation and other factors may play a more significant role than race alone
Hours per Week Rule: Working hours around 45-48 per week might have a neutral or positive influence when combined with other positive factors
